propositions.text: Title: 高校诡话：夷梦
Chapter 1: 鬼楼
A five-year-old Yang Sa receives a red agate pendant from her grandmother.
Yang Sa arrives at Ninghua Academy.
Ninghua Academy's history and reputation.
Yang Sa has an unfortunate first encounter at the academy.
Her luggage hits a boy, causing him to bleed.
A mysterious girl makes a cryptic remark about Yang Sa's future.
Yang Sa reports to the Chinese department.
She is assigned to the dilapidated 'Qinyuan Building'.
The Qinyuan Building has a dark history.
It was originally a morgue.
It later became a shelter where a gruesome murder occurred.
Another new student, Li You, also gets assigned to Qinyuan Building.
Li You has a past conflict with the student council president, Bai Lu.
Chapter 2: 寝室怪虫
Yang Sa experiences a terrifying nightmare in her dorm room.
She sees a black-faced apparition with blue eyes in the washroom.
She wakes up with a distinct handprint on her neck.
Chu Yunfei discusses the Qinyuan Building incident with Lei Hao.
Chu Yunfei dismisses it as a ploy to move out.
Yang Sa is deeply frightened and stays in her room.
She finds solace in memories of her hometown and her grandmother's pendant.
A black mud-like substance appears on Liu Chuman's bed.
White threads emerge from the mud and ensnare Yang Sa.
Yang Sa sees the head of a giant insect in the mud.
Chapter 13: 考古队
Yang Sa is brought back to Ninghua Academy by Chu Yunfei.
Chu Yunfei expresses concern and promises to help her recover.
Yang Sa has fragmented memories of the incident.
Chu Yunfei gives Yang Sa a pink sachet from her grandmother.
Chu Yunfei mentions that the Qinyuan Building has been demolished.
The demolition was due to the building's age and recent disappearances.
Yang Sa's new dormitory is in Taoxiyuan, next to Chu Yunfei's.
Chapter 31: 考古队
A boy named Sha Yu appears and claims to be Yang Sa's brother.
Sha Yu reveals he is from the Qing family, a family of demon hunters.
Li You is revealed to be Sha Yu's sister, Qing You.
Yang Sa struggles with her identity and memories.
She feels a growing disconnect from Chu Yunfei.
She believes she is a normal human, while Chu Yunfei is a Dragon God.
Chu Yunfei confirms he is not human and has been using his body.
Yang Sa is told that Sha Yu is her 'current boyfriend' and that he loves her.
She is instructed to take care of herself, and he will find a way to cure the蛊虫 (gu worm) in her body.
Chapter 41: 楚云飞
Chu Yunfei is still mourning Yang Sa's presumed death.
Yang Sa is brought to a high-end personal image design center.
She is transformed into a beautiful woman for an auction.
She uses her grandmother's diamond jewelry for the occasion.
Chu Yunfei is stunned by Yang Sa's transformation.

concepts.name: Yang Sa
concepts.context: The protagonist of the story, a young woman starting university.

concepts.name: Grandmother
concepts.context: Yang Sa's elderly grandmother, who has a significant past and left her important items.

concepts.name: Red Agate Pendant
concepts.context: A significant item left by Yang Sa's grandmother, which brings her comfort.

concepts.name: Ninghua Academy
concepts.context: The setting for the majority of the story, a prestigious but seemingly dangerous university.

concepts.name: Qinyuan Building
concepts.context: A dilapidated building at Ninghua Academy with a dark and haunted history, assigned to Yang Sa and Li You.

concepts.name: Li You
concepts.context: A fellow student assigned to Qinyuan Building, who becomes Yang Sa's friend and ally.

concepts.name: Chu Yunfei
concepts.context: The student council president, initially portrayed as arrogant but later revealed to have deeper feelings and a complex identity.

concepts.name: Bai Lu
concepts.context: A student council member with whom Li You has a past conflict.

concepts.name: Liu Chuman
concepts.context: One of Yang Sa's roommates.

concepts.name: Sha Yu
concepts.context: A character who claims to be Yang Sa's brother and is part of a demon-hunting family.

concepts.name: Lei Hao
concepts.context: A student who is friendly with Chu Yunfei and involved in the school newspaper.

concepts.name: Haunted
concepts.context: The general atmosphere and events associated with Qinyuan Building.

concepts.name: Morgue
concepts.context: The original purpose of Qinyuan Building.

concepts.name: Disappearances
concepts.context: Recent unsettling events at the academy linked to Qinyuan Building.

concepts.name: Demon Hunter
concepts.context: The ancestral profession of Sha Yu's family.

concepts.name: Dragon God
concepts.context: A nature attributed to Chu Yunfei, suggesting he is not human.

concepts.name: Gu Worm
concepts.context: An affliction or entity within Yang Sa's body that needs curing.

concepts.name: Diamond Jewelry
concepts.context: Valuable jewelry left by Yang Sa's grandmother, used for an important event.

concepts.name: Auction
concepts.context: An event Yang Sa and Chu Yunfei attend, requiring a significant transformation.

concepts.name: Transformation
concepts.context: Yang Sa undergoes a significant change in appearance and perception.

main_topics: Introduction to the story and protagonist
Arrival at Ninghua Academy and initial conflicts
The mysterious and haunted Qinyuan Building
Revelation of identities and a hidden past
The protagonist's transformation and upcoming events
hierarchy.structure: The document is structured into chapters, each detailing specific events, character introductions, and plot developments. The narrative moves from establishing the protagonist and setting, to introducing supernatural elements and mysteries, then revealing deeper plot layers involving family history and identity, culminating in a significant transformation for the protagonist.
